main.bio: I am a Computer Science (major) and Business (minor) graduate with coding experience in Java, Javascript, Python, PHP, and C. My way of working is methodical and meticulous. Quick on the uptake of ideas, business requirements, and technologies, I strive to provide value by adapting quickly and maintaining a strong work ethic. As a recent graduate ready to enter the software industry, I am interested in learning and practicing both front-end and back-end development, and I am confident to be up to the task.

work.title: Business Tools Developer
work.description: My main project at this internship was to perform an integration for the RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) workflow of the company among Salesforce, Liferay-Teamroom, and Agile JIRA, using Java, APEX, SOAP web-services, and REST web-services. My work enabled automation of the workflow, eliminating the need for manual monitoring and data entry, making the process more efficient and reliable, while also reducing the cost of operation. Additionally, I performed system administration, database administration, and extensive documentation, while also optimizing and implementing features for various reporting tools.
